text.0: in whose wild joy thou madest once Śambara divodāsas prey.
text.1: this soma is pressed out for thee o indra drink.
text.2: whose gladdening draught shed from the points thou guardest in the midst and end.
text.3: this soma is pressed out for thee o indra drink.
text.4: in whose wild joy thou settest free the kine held fast within the rock.
text.5: this soma is pressed out for thee o indra drink.
text.6: this in whose juice delighting thou gainest the might of maghavan.
text.7: this soma is pressed out for thee o indra drink.
